description: Try our easy to follow Thai Fishball Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Curry,Pescatarian,Fish,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai Fishball Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs lemon grass, very finely chopped
1 tsp fresh coriander, chopped, to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large nonstick wok and add the curry paste. Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes and then add the coconut milk. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat, and simmer gently, uncovered, for 6-8 minutes.
Add the fishballs, palm sugar, lime leaves, lemon grass, fish sauce, and bean sprouts. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat again and simmer, uncovered, for an additional 6-8 minutes.
To serve, ladle the curry into bowls, garnish with sliced red chili and fresh cilantro, and serve with steamed jasmine rice.
